FuncDef: The reset rip configuration command resets the configuration parameters of the specific RIP process. When the RIP process is initiated, the default configuration parameters are restored to the default value. The reset rip configuration command resets the configuration parameters of the specific RIP process. When the RIP process is initiated, the default configuration parameters are restored to the default value.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the RIP process ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

ExtraInfo: The reset rip configuration command resets system parameters for a specified RIP process. When a RIP process starts, all the parameters of the process retain their default values.
